title: When I vacationed here as a kid and oyung man, I don\'t recall hearing so much about beach erosion.  Why does it seem like the erosion is so much worse and pressing now for all the area beaches?
text:
In a word: development.



More and more beach development, in the form of condos and other
housing, building projects and more, all want close access to the
ocean. And the ocean, being the ocean, tends to erode or shift
shoreline. That being said, there's more money tied to these
projects, and money talks.
